answers.answer: i get this feeling alot but i was told i have anxiety. plus u had a ct scan and it came back normal

Hi phonenix888 how long have u been having this dizzy feeling? I have it for 6 months or more after my 1st panic attack so far i did mosy cardiac test and all are normal and doctor mentioned it could be anxiety but can it be anxiety when the light headed feeling are 24/7 ?

Hi, Thank you for your question. From the symptoms you describe, it sounds that it could be a circulatory disturbance (due to compression of blood vessels), ear disorder or nerve pinched.  This may be worsen by any clots in blood vessels, excessive alcohol use or diabetes. I would suggest evaluating all the possibilities with the help of a doctor first. Further referral to a neurologist will surely help you in getting a more precise opinion here. Hope this information proves help you.

Hi thanks for the reply,so wat are the things that i can do to make those dizzy lightheaded feeling much lesser,i have talk with the doctor as they arent very concerned about it as most of my vitals signs are fine,thanks

im not dizzy all the time but when i am it just comes out of no where. my first panic attack came  because of the dizziness. i hope its just anxiety but then again if it was any more serious i think it would have progressed more by now since it started almost 2 months ago. try to tell yourself that since the doctors and the tests indicate that its nothing serious. its probably not and will pass. i know its tough but we cant let these run our lives when its probably nothing. good luck

question: Hi,everyone i have been experincing this dizziness,lightheaded sensation for past 7 months,done all cardiac test including tilt table test which came back fine,and due to see a neurologist 24 june.Could be this dizziness lightheaded feeling due to a neuro problem ? thanks
title: Lightheaded causes ?
